xinstall.name: Image showcase
xinstall.description: Shows a collection of images using Slimbox (a lightbox clone).

param.name: css_name
param.label: CSS postfix
param.description: A value that will be added to all default class / id values for module identification.

param.name: folder
param.label: Image folder
param.description: The folder in which the images are located.

param.name: prefix_ori
param.label: Image prefix
param.description: A value that original images should start with.

param.name: prefix_thumb
param.label: Thumbnail prefix
param.description: A value that thumbnail images should start with (optional).

param.name: thumb_size
param.label: Thumbnail size
param.description: The maximum height / width for a thumbnail (in pixels).

param.name: amount
param.label: Amount of images
param.description: The amount of images to show.

param.name: ext
param.label: Image extension
param.description: The extension(s) of the images. Seperated by pipes (e.g. jpg|png|gif).

param.name: alt
param.label: Alt-value
param.description: The alt-attribute value of the displayed image.
